df-dec
blocks.content: Define the "decimal constructor", which is used to build up "decimal integers" or "numeric terms" in base ` 1 0 ` . For example, ` ( ; ; ; 1 0 0 0 + ; ; ; 2 0 0 0 ) = ; ; ; 3 0 0 0 ` ~ 1kp2ke3k . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Apr-2015.) (Revised by AV, 1-Aug-2021.)

blocks.name: 9p1e10
blocks.content: 9 + 1 = 10. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Apr-2015.) (Revised by Stanislas Polu, 7-Apr-2020.) (Revised by AV, 1-Aug-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm 9p1e10() {
  |- wceq(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), cdc(nat1, nat0))
} = {
  3eqtrri(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), cdc(nat1, nat0), co(co(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), cmul, nat1), caddc, nat0), co(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), caddc, nat0))
  df-dec(nat1, nat0)
  oveq1i(co(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), cmul, nat1), caddc, nat0, co(nat9, caddc, nat1))
  mulid1i(co(nat9, caddc, nat1))
  addid1i(co(nat9, caddc, nat1))
  nncni(co(nat9, caddc, nat1))
  mp2an(wcel(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), cn), wcel(nat9, cn), wcel(nat1, cn))
  9nn()
  1nn()
  nnaddcl(nat9, nat1)
}

blocks.name: numsuc
blocks.content: The successor of a decimal integer (no carry). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Feb-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm numsuc(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wceq(co(c0, caddc, nat1), co(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, c3))
  -| wcel(c1, cn0)
  -| wcel(c2, cn0)
  -| wcel(c4, cn0)
  -| wceq(co(c4, caddc, nat1), c3)
  -| wceq(c0, co(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, c4))
} = {
  3eqtri(co(c0, caddc, nat1), co(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, c3), co(co(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, c4), caddc, nat1), co(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c4, caddc, nat1)))
  oveq1i(c0, caddc, nat1, co(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, c4))
  addassi(co(c1, cmul, c2), c4, nat1)
  nn0cni(co(c1, cmul, c2))
  nn0mulcli(c1, c2)
  nn0cni(c4)
  ax-1cn()
  oveq2i(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c4, caddc, nat1), c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm numsuc(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0[+]1)=((c1[√ó]c2)[+]c3)
  ‚ä£ c1 ‚àà ‚Ñï0
  ‚ä£ c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0
  ‚ä£ c4 ‚àà ‚Ñï0
  ‚ä£ (c4[+]1)= c3
  ‚ä£ c0 =((c1[√ó]c2)[+]c4)
} = {
  3eqtri((c0[+]1), ((c1[√ó]c2)[+]c3), (((c1[√ó]c2)[+]c4)[+]1), ((c1[√ó]c2)[+](c4[+]1)))
  oveq1i(c0, caddc, nat1, ((c1[√ó]c2)[+]c4))
  addassi((c1[√ó]c2), c4, nat1)
  nn0cni((c1[√ó]c2))
  nn0mulcli(c1, c2)
  nn0cni(c4)
  ax-1cn()
  oveq2i((c1[√ó]c2), caddc, (c4[+]1), c3)
}

blocks.name: numlt
blocks.content: Comparing two decimal integers (equal higher places). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Feb-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm numlt(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wbr(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, c2), clt, co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, c3))
  -| wcel(c0, cn)
  -| wcel(c1, cn0)
  -| wcel(c2, cn0)
  -| wcel(c3, cn)
  -| wbr(c2, clt, c3)
} = {
  mpbi(wbr(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, c2), clt, co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, c3)), wbr(c2, clt, c3))
  ltadd2i(c2, c3, co(c0, cmul, c1))
  nn0rei(c2)
  nnrei(c3)
  nn0rei(co(c0, cmul, c1))
  nn0mulcli(c0, c1)
  nnnn0i(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm numlt(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0[√ó]c1)[+]c2)[<]((c0[√ó]c1)[+]c3)
  ‚ä£ c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï
  ‚ä£ c1 ‚àà ‚Ñï0
  ‚ä£ c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0
  ‚ä£ c3 ‚àà ‚Ñï
  ‚ä£ c2[<]c3
} = {
  mpbi(((c0[√ó]c1)[+]c2)[<]((c0[√ó]c1)[+]c3), c2[<]c3)
  ltadd2i(c2, c3, (c0[√ó]c1))
  nn0rei(c2)
  nnrei(c3)
  nn0rei((c0[√ó]c1))
  nn0mulcli(c0, c1)
  nnnn0i(c0)
}

blocks.name: numltc
blocks.content: Comparing two decimal integers (unequal higher places). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Feb-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm numltc(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wbr(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, c2), clt, co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, c4))
  -| wcel(c0, cn)
  -| wcel(c1, cn0)
  -| wcel(c3, cn0)
  -| wcel(c2, cn0)
  -| wcel(c4, cn0)
  -| wbr(c2, clt, c0)
  -| wbr(c1, clt, c3)
} = {
  mp2an(wbr(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, c2), clt, co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, c4)), wbr(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, c2), clt, co(c0, cmul, c3)), wbr(co(c0, cmul, c3), cle, co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, c4)))
  mp2an(wbr(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, c2), clt, co(c0, cmul, c3)), wbr(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, c2), clt, co(c0, cmul, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), wbr(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), cle, co(c0, cmul, c3)))
  breqtrri(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, c2), clt, co(c0, cmul, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, c0))
  numlt(c0, c1, c2, c0)
  eqtri(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, c0), co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(c0, cmul, nat1)))
  adddii(c0, c1, nat1)
  recni(c1)
  ax-1cn()
  oveq2i(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(c0, cmul, nat1), c0)
  mulid1i(c0)
  recni(c0)
  mpbi(wbr(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), cle, co(c0, cmul, c3)), wbr(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cle, c3))
  mpbi(wbr(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cle, c3), wbr(c1, clt, c3))
  mp2an(wb(wbr(c1, clt, c3), wbr(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cle, c3)), wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(c3, cn0))
  nn0ltp1le(c1, c3)
  ax-mp(wb(wbr(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cle, c3), wbr(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), cle, co(c0, cmul, c3))), wbr(nat0, clt, c0))
  nngt0i(c0)
  lemul2i(c0, co(c1, caddc, nat1), c3)
  ltletri(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, c2), co(c0, cmul, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), co(c0, cmul, c3))
  remulcli(c0, co(c1, caddc, nat1))
  ax-mp(wcel(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  peano2re(c1)
  nn0addge1i(co(c0, cmul, c3), c4)
  ltletri(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, c2), co(c0, cmul, c3), co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, c4))
  readdcli(co(c0, cmul, c1), c2)
  remulcli(c0, c1)
  nn0rei(c1)
  nn0rei(c2)
  readdcli(co(c0, cmul, c3), c4)
  remulcli(c0, c3)
  nnrei(c0)
  nn0rei(c3)
  nn0rei(c4)
}

blocks.name: le9lt10
blocks.content: A "decimal digit" (i.e. a nonnegative integer less than or equal to 9) is less then 10. (Contributed by AV, 8-Sep-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm le9lt10(class c0) {
  |- wbr(c0, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  -| wcel(c0, cn0)
  -| wbr(c0, cle, nat9)
} = {
  breqtri(c0, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0), co(nat9, caddc, nat1))
  mpbi(wbr(c0, clt, co(nat9, caddc, nat1)), wbr(c0, cle, nat9))
  mp2an(wb(wbr(c0, cle, nat9), wbr(c0, clt, co(nat9, caddc, nat1))), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(nat9, cz))
  nn0zi(c0)
  nn0zi(nat9)
  9nn0()
  zleltp1(c0, nat9)
  9p1e10()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm le9lt10(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ c0[<]cdc(1, 0)
  ‚ä£ c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0
  ‚ä£ c0[‚â§]9
} = {
  breqtri(c0, clt, cdc(1, 0), (9[+]1))
  mpbi(c0[<](9[+]1), c0[‚â§]9)
  mp2an((c0[‚â§]9 ‚Üî c0[<](9[+]1)), c0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, 9 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)
  nn0zi(c0)
  nn0zi(nat9)
  9nn0()
  zleltp1(c0, nat9)
  9p1e10()
}

thm decltc(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  -| wcel(c0, cn0)
  -| wcel(c2, cn0)
  -| wcel(c1, cn0)
  -| wcel(c3, cn0)
  -| wbr(c1, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  -| wbr(c0, clt, c2)
} = {
  3brtr4i(cdc(c0, c1), clt, cdc(c2, c3), co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c0), caddc, c1), co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c2), caddc, c3))
  numltc(cdc(nat1, nat0), c0, c1, c2, c3)
  10nn()
  dfdec10(c0, c1)
  dfdec10(c2, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:

  ‚ä¢ cdc(c0, c1)[<]cdc(c2, c3)

  ‚ä£ c3 ‚àà ‚Ñï0

thm decsuc(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  10nn0()

  dfdec10(c1, c2)

blocks.name: 4t3lem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ 4t3e12 and related theorems. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm 4t3lem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wceq(co(c0, cmul, c1), c2)
  -| wcel(c0, cn0)
  -| wcel(c3, cn0)
  -| wceq(c1, co(c3, caddc, nat1))
  -| wceq(co(c0, cmul, c3), c4)
  -| wceq(co(c4, caddc, c0), c2)
} = {
  eqtri(co(c0, cmul, c1), c2, co(c0, cmul, co(c3, caddc, nat1)))
  oveq2i(c0, cmul, c1, co(c3, caddc, nat1))
  eqtri(co(c0, cmul, co(c3, caddc, nat1)), c2, co(c4, caddc, c0))
  eqtri(co(c0, cmul, co(c3, caddc, nat1)), co(c4, caddc, c0), co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c0, cmul, nat1)))
  adddii(c0, c3, nat1)
  nn0cni(c3)
  ax-1cn()
  oveq12i(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c0, cmul, nat1), c4, c0)
  mulid1i(c0)
  nn0cni(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm 4t3lem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0[√ó]c1)= c2
  ‚ä£ c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0
  ‚ä£ c3 ‚àà ‚Ñï0
  ‚ä£ c1 =(c3[+]1)
  ‚ä£ (c0[√ó]c3)= c4
  ‚ä£ (c4[+]c0)= c2
} = {
  eqtri((c0[√ó]c1), c2, (c0[√ó](c3[+]1)))
  oveq2i(c0, cmul, c1, (c3[+]1))
  eqtri((c0[√ó](c3[+]1)), c2, (c4[+]c0))
  eqtri((c0[√ó](c3[+]1)), (c4[+]c0), ((c0[√ó]c3)[+](c0[√ó]1)))
  adddii(c0, c3, nat1)
  nn0cni(c3)
  ax-1cn()
  oveq12i((c0[√ó]c3), caddc, (c0[√ó]1), c4, c0)
  mulid1i(c0)
  nn0cni(c0)
}
